templates.title: Choose a Template
templates.subtitle: Choose a template to get started quickly with pre-configured modules.
templates.sampleDataDescription: Populate the group with example content to help you get started
templates.manualModeDescription: Manual mode: You'll select individual modules in the next step.

simpleGroup.name: Simple Group
simpleGroup.description: A minimal group with just messaging. Perfect for getting started quickly.

mutualAidNetwork.name: Mutual Aid Network
mutualAidNetwork.description: Share resources and coordinate community support. Perfect for neighborhood networks.

governance.name: Democratic Decisions
governance.description: Add proposals and voting for collective decisions

unionChapter.name: Union Chapter
unionChapter.description: Complete tools for workplace organizing: campaigns, contacts, and democratic governance.

publicPresence.name: Public Presence
publicPresence.description: Create a public-facing page for your chapter

documents.name: Document Suite
documents.description: Collaborative documents for contracts, grievances, and notes

files.name: File Storage
files.description: Secure storage for contracts, photos, and evidence

activistCollective.name: Activist Collective
activistCollective.description: Coordinate campaigns, build knowledge, and mobilize your community effectively.

crm.name: Contact Management
crm.description: Track supporters, volunteers, and outreach efforts

database.name: Custom Databases
database.description: Create custom tracking systems for your campaigns

communityHub.name: Community Hub
communityHub.description: A general-purpose space for community organizing and connection. Perfect for neighborhoods and social groups.

governance.name: Collective Decisions
governance.description: Add proposals and voting for community decisions

documents.name: Document Suite
documents.description: Collaborative documents for meeting notes and planning

files.name: File Sharing
files.description: Shared file storage for community resources

crm.name: Contact Directory
crm.description: Manage community contacts and local businesses

mediaCollective.name: Media Collective
mediaCollective.description: Community journalism with democratic self-governance. Publish articles, syndicate to networks, and make decisions together.

openNewsroom.name: Open Newsroom
openNewsroom.description: Accept public story submissions from the community

wireService.name: Wire Service Mode
wireService.description: Aggregate and republish stories from other collectives

events.name: Events & Press Conferences
events.description: Organize press events, community meetings, and coverage coordination

mutualAid.name: Community Resources
mutualAid.description: Connect readers with community resources and mutual aid

microblogging.name: Breaking News Updates
microblogging.description: Post quick updates, breaking news, and social media-style content

editorialPolicyChange.title: Editorial Policy Change
editorialPolicyChange.description: Propose changes to editorial guidelines, standards, or policies

coveragePriority.title: Coverage Priority
coveragePriority.description: Set or change coverage priorities for the collective

styleGuideUpdate.title: Style Guide Update
styleGuideUpdate.description: Propose updates to the collective's style guide

newMemberApproval.title: New Member Approval
newMemberApproval.description: Vote on accepting a new member to the collective

roleAssignment.title: Role Assignment
roleAssignment.description: Assign a member to a specific role

electEditorialBoard.title: Elect Editorial Board
electEditorialBoard.description: Elect members to serve on the editorial board

joinCoalition.title: Join Coalition
joinCoalition.description: Vote on joining a regional or global media coalition

leaveCoalition.title: Leave Coalition
leaveCoalition.description: Vote on leaving a coalition the collective currently belongs to

partnershipAgreement.title: Partnership Agreement
partnershipAgreement.description: Establish a partnership with another organization

budgetAllocation.title: Budget Allocation
budgetAllocation.description: Allocate collective funds for specific purposes

contentDispute.title: Content Dispute Resolution
contentDispute.description: Resolve disputes about published or pending content

retractionRequest.title: Retraction or Correction
retractionRequest.description: Vote on retracting or correcting published content

syndicationApproval.title: Syndication Approval
syndicationApproval.description: Approve syndicating a specific article to coalition(s)
